0.0.1.name: wordpress/braille
0.0.1.description:
This plugin provides a "braille" shortcode to translate the enclosed text into Braille. Some sections of a website may be marked to be translated into Braille automatically without requiring the shortcode.

The plugin also provides a Braille output type for the Anthologize plugin. You may select BRL or SimBraille output. BRL is suitable for embossing. SimBraille produces an HTML file with UTF-8 encoded glyphs representing the embossed form of the characters suitable for display in a visual interface.

N.B.: This plugin requires LibLouis installed on the same system as the WordPress site or access to a remote service providing LibLouis functionality.
